name: Jack's Journey (EntropicEquanimity)
description:
Please help by giving a short review 請幫忙回答問卷 :)

Controls 控制

WASD: Move 移動
Mouse Left Click滑鼠左鍵: Primary Attack 主攻擊
Mouse Right Click滑鼠右鍵: Secondary 副攻擊
Shift: Character Ability角色技能 
E / Spacebar空白鍵: Interact 撿拾/互動
G: Drop item掉落
Tab: Inventory背包
Escape: Pause暫停

!!Items on the ground disappear after a while 過一陣子在地上的東西會消失!!!!Everything is free for now 商店裡面的東西現在都免費!!

Summary 故事大綱

Jack's Journey is based on one of our very own team members. He is whisked away to a strange world and begins his journey of chopping monsters and conquering bosses, eventually becoming the savior of the world. Probably.

Jack's Journey是一款我們以組上成員他的名字來設想他穿越到了異世界，開始了過關斬將的旅程，成為拯救世界的主角。

The Team? 組員

李修珍: Advising Teacher 指導老師
蔣貴麟  Joshua Chiang: Programmer程式 / UX Designer / English Translator英文翻譯
李伯呈 Jack Lee: Character Design角色設計 / Artist美術
陳灝融 Haolong: Enemy Design 敵人設計/ Artist 美術/ Story故事
徐煒翔 Weixiang: Sound音效
李維忠 Oscar(New): Level Design關卡設計 / Game Tester 遊戲測試
林芳榆 Angela(New): Secretary文書

Update Map

Finish main story-line
Add in a Boss
Add in Thai translations
Complete saving/loading game saves
Add more Weapons
Add more Armor
Add more Artifacts
Add more class-specific Abilities
Add more Skills

NOTE:

*Only available in 1920x1080 at the moment. 目前可用視窗為 1920x1080

*Story mode is currently disabled and only the survival mode is enabled for now. 暫時

*Artifacts and Armor should not be in the drop pool at the moment but you can buy them from the Blacksmith dude... for a price.
